alert.note: Alert for Eastern Essex; Western Essex (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 02 at 3:12PM EST until January 02 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Periods of snow expected. Patchy freezing drizzle possible. Light snow accumulation expected along with a possible glaze of ice through this evening. * WHERE...Portions of central, northeast and southern Vermont and northern New York. * WHEN...Until 7 PM EST this evening. * IMPACTS...Slippery roads and hazardous travel conditions are possible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Periods of snow will continue through early this evening, then quickly come to an end.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Please allow extra time if travel is necessary.
